meanings.sent1: The soil in the garden was clumpiest after the heavy rain.
meanings.sent2: The clumpiest bushes in the forest provided shelter for small animals.
meanings.sent3: The clumpiest dough made the baker's job more challenging.
meanings.sent4: Her hair, clumpiest after a windy walk, needed to be brushed.
meanings.sent5: The clumpiest clouds gathered ominously in the sky before the storm.

meanings.definition: Having a tendency to form clumps.
meanings.sent1: The clumpiest clay was perfect for pottery making.
meanings.sent2: The clumpiest snow was ideal for building a snowman.
meanings.sent3: The clumpiest cereal in the bowl made breakfast more interesting.
meanings.sent4: Her clumpiest socks always ended up bunched in her shoes.
meanings.sent5: The clumpiest paint created a textured effect on the canvas.

meanings.sent1: The clumpiest soup in the pot was everyone's favorite.
meanings.sent2: The clumpiest fabric was used to make warm blankets.
meanings.sent3: The clumpiest traffic jam caused delays for commuters.
meanings.sent4: Her clumpiest shoes were perfect for hiking in rough terrain.
meanings.sent5: The clumpiest mud on the trail made walking difficult.
